pr_title: [GEOT-6524] The GeoPackage Plugin does not support long integers

timeline.message: [GEOT-6524] The GeoPackage Plugin does not support long integers

timeline.bodyText: Not clear to me why this one was changed, I mean I understand that a  MEDIUMINT is an int, bu did the test just keep working whit this change?
timeline.author: nmco

replies.bodyText: MEDIUMINT is a 32 bits integer, INTEGER is a 64bit integer. The map to different types in Java now (the previous code was not aware of the various types of sqlite integers, from 8 to 64 bits)
replies.author: aaime
